Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.beans

Class MockDeposit

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.beans.MockDeposit
public class MockDeposit
extends java.lang.Object
Local copy of a Player's deposit.

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> getActiveLeadersDeposit()
      Gets the active leader deposits.
      Returns:
      a map associating the indexes of the leaders to the corresponding deposits if the leaders are active and have the deposit ability
